title: I don't understand why I think this is so funny
body: ...something about it just cracks me up:<br/>"Bush lost consciousness for a brief time in the White House on Sunday evening while eating a pretzel and watching a professional football game on television. He fell from his couch and has a scrape and large bruise on his left cheekbone, plus a bruise on his lower lip, to show for his troubles. His glasses cut the side of his face. … [Air Force physician Richard] Tubb told reporters Bush reported a pretzel 'did not go down right' and the doctor said it was possible a pretzel had lodged against a nerve and momentarily caused a decrease in the president's heart rate, causing him to faint."<br/>—"<a href="http://www.cnn.com/2002/ALLPOLITICS/01/14/bush.fainting/">Bush on Fainting Episode: Chew Your Food</a>," CNN, Jan. 14, 2002<br/>(from <a href="http://slate.msn.com/id/2101597/fr/rss/">Slate</a>)
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-06-02

I don't understand why I think this is so funny

...something about it just cracks me up:

bodyNavItems.text: I don't understand why I think this is so funny
BioDiesel, it's time to switch... or is it?
